LanguageData.RocketConfetti.label: confetti shell
LanguageData.RocketConfetti.description: Filled with confetti and a small explosive charge, barely destructive but extremely humiliating.
LanguageData.RocketIncendiary.label: Incendiary
LanguageData.RocketIncendiary.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.
LanguageData.RocketSmoke.label: Smoke
LanguageData.RocketSmoke.description: Filled with a smoke-producing agent. Explodes on impact to generate a thick smokescreen.
LanguageData.RocketEMP.label: EMP
LanguageData.RocketEMP.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.
LanguageData.RocketFoam.label: Foam
LanguageData.RocketFoam.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.
LanguageData.RocketCluster.label: Cluster
LanguageData.RocketIllumination.label: Illumination
LanguageData.RocketIllumination.description: Lights up a large area with the illumination agents insides that ignited on impact, lasts for roughtly 3 hours. May cause fire when ignited in enclosed space.
